sections.title: Seaside Relax
sections.subtitle: Batumi on the Black Sea
sections.description: Batumi is a perfect seaside base: modern infrastructure, easy logistics, and a great mix of beach and city life.
sections.fullDescription: Batumi is a Black Sea resort where sea breeze meets vibrant city energy. We plan your trip so it feels effortless: a clear day rhythm, smart stops, and the best views without rushing. From May to October the city is especially pleasant — warm evenings, boulevard walks and that calm “everything is handled” feeling.
sections.imageAlt: Sunrise over the Black Sea in Batumi — soft light and peaceful seaside atmosphere

sections.title: Beaches & Promenade
sections.subtitle: Long walks by the water
sections.description: Batumi beaches and the iconic boulevard are made for sunsets, biking and relaxed evenings — great for families, couples and solo travelers.
sections.fullDescription: Batumi Boulevard is a long seaside promenade with cafés, bike lanes, modern art and sea views. Beaches are mostly pebble (with some sand spots); in season you’ll find amenities like sunbeds and umbrellas. We’ll recommend the best areas depending on your vibe: calmer spots, better sea entry, and the prettiest sunsets.
sections.imageAlt: Batumi beach with pebble and sand — calm shoreline and deep sea gradients

sections.title: Activities & Highlights
sections.subtitle: Sea by day, city by night
sections.description: Waterpark, dolphinarium, cable car, botanical garden, restaurants, bars and nightlife — Batumi never feels boring.
sections.fullDescription: If you want more than beach time: we can add the cable car for panoramic views, a walk in the Botanical Garden, and a shortlist of genuinely good food spots. On request — family-friendly activities, romantic routes, photo stops, and curated Ajara mini-trips with the right pacing.
sections.imageAlt: Batumi coastline at night — neon lights, promenade vibe and city energy

sections.title: Hotels by the Sea
sections.subtitle: From apartments to 5★ premium
sections.description: We’ll match your stay to your needs: location, sea view, SPA, pool, quiet comfort, or city-life right on the boulevard.
sections.fullDescription: Batumi offers everything from premium hotels with SPA to modern beachfront apartments and cozy guesthouses. We consider what matters: sea view, kitchen, proximity to the boulevard, parking, noise level, and overall comfort. The goal is simple — a place that truly fits your style, not just a “nice listing.”
sections.imageAlt: Modern seaside hotel in Batumi — glass facade reflecting the coast
